SELECT m.* FROM member m JOIN chat_room cr ON m.member_num = cr.chatRoom_member_num2 WHERE cr.chatRoom_num = #{chatRoom_num};
SELECT * FROM chat WHERE chat_chatRoom_num = #{chatRoom_num} ORDER BY chat_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT p.* FROM post p JOIN chat_room c ON p.post_num = c.chatRoom_post_num WHERE c.chatRoom_num = #{chatRoomNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification ( notification_member_num, notification_type_num, notification_chatRoom_num, notification_message ) VALUES ( #{member_num}, #{type}, #{chatRoom_num}, #{content} )
